Caption: Error
Message: Some error occurred with the Oracle database connection.\nPlease contact BBQ support.

Caption: Oracle Instant Client
Message: Could not find Oracle Instant Client.\n Please verify BBQ is installed properly.\nContact BBQ support if installing the latest version does not solve the problem.

Caption: Oracle Instant Client
Message: Could not initialise Oracle Instant Client.\n Please contact BBQ support.

Caption: Connection timeout
Message: Connection has timed out. Please check your connection. \nYou may need to use a VPN connection if you are working remotely.

Caption: Invalid credentials
Message: Invalid username and/or password. Logon denied.

Caption: Account locked
Message: Your account is locked.\nPlease contact the database administrator.
